mapper.insert: insert into lesson (lesson_id, lesson_index, lesson_title, lesson_description, lesson_viewcounts, lesson_score, chapter_id) values (#{lesson_id}, #{lesson_index}, #{lesson_title}, #{lesson_description}, #{lesson_viewcounts}, #{lesson_score}, #{chapter_id});
insert into lesson (lesson_id, lesson_index, lesson_title, lesson_description, lesson_viewcounts, lesson_score, chapter_id) values (#{lesson_id}, null, null, null, null, null, null);
mapper.update: update lesson set lesson_title = #{lesson_title}, lesson_description = #{lesson_description}, lesson_score = #{lesson_score} where chapter_id = #{chapter_id};
mapper.delete: delete from lesson where chapter_id = #{chapter_id} and lesson_index = #{lesson_index};
